# AVDepthData.Accuracy.absolute

**Case**

Values within the depth map are absolutely accurate within the physical world.

## Declaration

```swift
case absolute
```

## Accuracy values

- **AVDepthData.Accuracy.relative**: Values within the depth data map are usable for foreground/background separation, but are not absolutely accurate in the physical world.

items.description: Values within the depth data map are usable for foreground/background separation, but are not absolutely accurate in the physical world.
